General.Name: Supreme Infrastructure India Limited
General.Description: Supreme Infrastructure India Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the engineering and construction of roads, bridges, railways, power, buildings, and irrigation and sewerage projects in India. It also owns and operates ready mix concrete, asphalt, and crushing plants. Supreme Infrastructure India Limited was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.

4.Name: Mr. Kamlesh  Chechani
4.Title: Head of BOT and Gen. Mang. of Fin.
